changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tables.address ( id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY, customer_id UUID NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, street VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, building_number VARCHAR(10), flat_number INTEGER, office VARCHAR(50), comment VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES tables.customer (id), FOREIGN KEY (city, street) REFERENCES dictionaries.street (city, street) );
